error.message: Call to deprecated function module_load_install(). Deprecated in drupal:9.4.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use Drupal::moduleHandler()->loadInclude($module, 'install') instead. Note, the replacement no longer allows including code from uninstalled modules.
